body.name: Furnulem Wide Dresser with 8 Fabric Drawers, TV Entertainment Center with Storage for 55'' TV, Large Chest of Drawers for Bedroom, Living Room, Dorm, Closet, Entryway, Wood Top (Black Oak)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 46 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 46 mins
features: Large Storage Space:Features 8 removable wide drawers, The drawer is perfect for organizing clothes, blankets, scarves, socks and other accessories. It can be used inside or outside the closet, also this wide wood top can be used as TV stand console.

Multipurpose Usage :This dresser can be used in multiple rooms and is very suitable for closets, laundry rooms, bedrooms, living rooms, corridors, nurseries, playrooms, entrances, university dormitories, offices, etc.

Lightweight and Portable : The dresser is made of Superior MDF board, which is durable and easy to clean. Fabric Drawers are made of polyester and non-woven fabric (NOT WOOD DRAWER), the TV stand is lightweight and portable, less of hassles to move.

Easy Assemble : The package includes all the tools and accessories, you can install it in 20 minutes with the instruction .Perfect Gift With functional and decorative characters, our tall drawer table will be a great gift for a housewarming or your family and friends.

Safe and Stable : Friendly to young ones, This organizer with fabric drawers won't pinch hands if little guys want to organize their clothing in drawers . The anti-tip kit to install the dresser on the wall to provides a safe environment for your family

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble / makes bedroom look complete. Satisfied with my purchase :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional 8-Drawer Dresser: Beautiful, Sturdy, and Spacious Storage Solution
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely thrilled with my recent purchase of the 8-drawer dresser. This dresser exhibits exceptional beauty, sturdiness, and an abundance of storage space.The design of the dresser is simply beautiful, seamlessly blending with my room’s style and creating an aesthetically pleasing centerpiece. The quality of construction ensures its sturdiness and durability, providing confidence in its long-lasting performance.With its eight spacious drawers, this dresser offers ample storage capacity for clothing, accessories, linens, and personal belongings. The organization and functionality it provides have transformed my room into a clutter-free haven.The fabric drawers add a cozy and inviting touch to the overall design, contributing to the dresser’s charm. While it may not suit everyone’s preferences, I find it to be a perfect fit for my desired aesthetic.The value for the price of this dresser is exceptional. It offers remarkable quality, functionality, and stunning design, making it a wise investment for any bedroom.In conclusion, the 8-drawer dresser is an exceptional storage solution, exhibiting beauty, sturdiness, and abundant storage capacity. Its design, durability, and value make it a standout piece for any room in need of reliable and spacious storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Liked enough to buy 2
reviews.reviewText: These dressers are quick and easy to set up. Look nice and hold a lot of clothes. We bought the 2 dressers to hold all of our pants in our closet. It helped my closet to look clean and tidy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something to hold all of my tech and this did the trick. I had previously bought the cheap plastic drawers, but they started to bow due to the weight which made it difficult to open and close. These drawers didn't bow with the weight of all my tech, and I love how I can just pull one of the drawers out completely and carry it around my house for small tech projects and slide it back in when I'm done using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have two they hold my clothes and other junk fine they’re not the sturdiest but will work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect just for me
reviews.reviewText: Alot of customers are mad about these kinds of dressers cause they can't believe its not real wood. As for me, i own a real wood one, but its too fat and not enough storage. Found this and read the description, its perfect. Cheap and alot of storage. A simple downgrade and it fits perfectly in my small room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Extremely poor quality
reviews.reviewText: This is another of a disturbing trend of products appearing on Amazon that look and sound good in the description and images and and are actually extremely poor quality.The body of this dresser is essentially card board and covered with a stretchy printed material (Similar to tights nylon). The 'fabric' is similar to the disposable cloth on reusable shopping bags.I could easily lift the box that this whole dresser came in in one hand. Save yourself the return and look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for a sturdy item
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to put together, my teenagers did it for me. It does the job and holds a 55in TV with no issues. Would buy again
